snippet: MARGULIES--David. Deeply engaged citizen of the world and theatre community, actor David Margulies was admired and loved. His huge appetite for life and work, his endless curiosity and genuine interest in people, current events, history, his love of music and spicy food were boundless. He leaves us with colorful and unforgettable memories of a vivid personality, great vitality, and sharp intellect capped by his beloved straw hats. We love you David. Jon, Sunya, Vicki, Zachary Margulies and Lois Smith. 1/3
